_header: Shalt dreaden God for he wrought thee
_description: Our relationship to God — one monrhyming quatrain in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
[S]alt dreden god ffor he wrouthte þeSalt louen god ffor he
                    bouthte þe[S]alt trosten in god ffor he fedit þeSalt folwen
                    god ffor he ledit þe
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 64.
